Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored for Scotland in the 32nd minute.
Ivan Perisic and Igor Matanovic combined for Croatia's equalizer four minutes later.
Andre Kramaric scored the winning goal for Croatia in the 70th minute.
Scotland had a goal disallowed for offside with the last kick of the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Luka Modric was impactful throughout the game, orchestrating play and covering every blade of grass.
Modric won all three of his tackles, made six recoveries, and intercepted the ball six times.
Modric's passing was crisp, helping his side traverse vertically on the pitch.
